page.title: 08BOATING AT GOLANT
page.content: There are facilities for tourists with boats at Golant. A{quay}and {slipway}offer easy access to the river for small boats. {Castledore Rowing Club}is also based here, and boats belonging to the {Y.H.A.}at Golant, are also stored near the quay.{A marine engineer}in Golant offers the services of engine repairs, motor boat hire, outboard motor hire and also runs a{taxi service. The river is only navigable three hours either side of high water, at other times the water is too shallow and large mud and sand flats are exposed. There is a small{chandlers}which also arranges{fishing trips. Many boats with summer moorings elsewhere on the river, are berthed on the mud at Golant in the winter.
